title: Use-case landing: gift, season, sport, budget
content:
Use-case landing: gift, season, sport, budget

Build a use-case page so AI can quote context-specific recommendations.

Learning goal

  • Draft one use-case landing (e.g., gift or season).
  • Link 3–5 products with reasons.

Why it matters

  • AI often gets contextual questions (“gift for mom”, “winter running”).
  • Use-case pages increase citability.

Explanation

  • Hero: who/when.
  • Decision criteria.
  • Product list with reasons.
  • Policy/fit short.

Examples

  • Good: “Winter running: insulation, grip, visibility; top 3 models linked.”
  • Poor: Grid without context.

Guided exercise (10–15 min)

  1. Choose a use-case, write the blocks.
  2. Add 3–5 products with short reasons.

Independent exercise (5–10 min)

Draft a second use-case outline.

Self-check

  • Use-case hero present.
  • Criteria and product list with reasons.
  • Policy/fit noted.

Optional deepening

  • Generative content guidance: https://developers.google.com/search/docs/fundamentals/using-gen-ai-content
